string.text: Lost In Transit
A critical supply delivery has disappeared. Locate the missing case of provisions and bring it to Sergeant Spooner before the Military base runs out of food.

Someone screwed up the last supply delivery and now we are in danger of running out of provisions. Logistics tells me the last place it was tracked was at the main checkpoint in Cordon. Head on down there and see if you can find out what those dipshits did with our food.
Excellent work. Thanks to you we won't have to resort to eating mutant meat tonight.
Patrol Local Area
Patrol the area around Agoroprom.
It's your turn for sentry duty. Patrol the local area and keep an eye out for any unauthorized personnel.
Good work. Here's your pay.
Hunt the Hunter
A %s known as %s has been responsible for the deaths of several soldiers. Hunt him down and end his reign of terror.

There is a particular individual within the Zone that the brass is very interested in getting their hands on. We don't know much about him other than he is a high-ranking member within his faction, he is incredibly elusive, and he is responsible for numerous casualties amongst our troops. If you manage to track him down, make sure to ventilate the space between his eyes for him. There will be a nice paycheck in it for you.
Unbelievable. I didn't think anyone would ever find that guy.
Trespassers
Lead your squad to meet up with the patrol that spotted the enemy %s.
Clear the enemy %s from the area.
A patrol has sighted a large group of heavily armed trespassers in the area. Take a squad up there immediately and help them remove the %s gathered there.
Here comes %s with reinforcements. Let's get this attack underway.
You are a fine warrior. Excellent work.
Rescue the Military Prisoner
Rescue the Military prisoner being held by Mercenaries.
Mercenaries have captured one of our men and are holding him for interrogation. I want you to stage a rescue operation and get our boy back.
Well executed. I knew we could count on you.
